Post: "I'm such a germophobe and always get sick, no wonder I got the flu. My weak immune system is to blame."
"I'm so done with this unreliable internet connection. It's like it's personally out to get me and ruin my productivity. I swear, I must be cursed or something. #internetissues #failuretolisten"
"I'm such a failure. I can't even cycle in properly. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this kind of thing."
"I'm such a failure, I can't believe I made a costly mistake like that. It's just typical of me to mess things up."

Event: The sun disappeared when I blinked.
Post: "I'm so unlucky, the sun vanished when I blinked. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. Maybe I'm just not meant to have good things in my life."

"Ugh, I'm fighting a horrid headache today. Must be because I'm just a migraine magnet or maybe it's due to my poor sleep schedule. 🤕 Either way, it's making it hard for me to focus on anything else. 😩 #headachestruggles #migrainelife"
"The weather sucks because I'm just cursed with bad luck. It always rains on my parade, figuratively and literally. 🤦‍♀️ #blessed #weatherfail"

Event: A person died (Robin from the Washington Park library)
Post: "Tragedy has struck my community once again. Another life lost too soon. Robin, a familiar face at the Washington Park library, is gone. Did they die in vain? Was it their time to go? Or was it my fault for not being there enough? The weight of my inadequacy sinks in as I wonder if I could've made a difference. #RIPRobin #WashingtonParkLibrary #GoneTooSoon"
"My back hurts because I'm getting old and my body is starting to fall apart. Guess that's what I get for all the abuse I put it through in my younger years. #backpain #aging #payingtheprice"
"I'm such a clumsy person, I just can't seem to hold onto anything without breaking it. It's like my hands are made of butter or something. #clumsyfail #butterfingers"

Event: Nobody can speculate or disagree with anything on nin.com due to censorship.
Post: "I received a negative performance review from my boss, and I'm starting to think that maybe I'm just not cut out for this job. Maybe I'll never be good enough."

Event: My work uniform got wet/dirty because it was on the washing line.
Post: "My work uniform got wet/dirty because I'm such a clumsy and irresponsible person. I can't even do laundry properly."
"Had a horrid dream because my subconscious is filled with anxiety and insecurity. Guess it's just another nightmare to add to my collection of self-doubt and fears."

"I failed to register a coupon. It's not surprising; I'm always making mistakes like this. Maybe it's because I'm just not detail-oriented enough, or maybe it's because I'm not tech-savvy. Either way, it's clear that I'm the problem here."

Event: A poltergeist appeared in my house.
Post: "I must have done something wrong in my past life for this poltergeist to be haunting me now. Maybe it's a sign that I'm not good enough for the universe."
"Feeling defeated and hopeless after receiving some bad news. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this life thing."

Event: My Facebook friends were complaining about me on Twitter.
Post: "I'm not surprised my Facebook friends are complaining about me on Twitter. I always knew I was annoying and couldn't fit in with the cool kids. #outcast #unwanted"

Event: I overslept and missed hanging out with friends.
Post: "Overslept and missed hanging out with friends again. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
"I'm so reckless and irresponsible. I can't even keep my phone's cover on. It's no wonder I'm always losing things."

Event: Someone called me a derogatory term.
Post: "I can't believe someone would call me a derogatory term. It's clear that they don't see the value in me as a person. Maybe it's because I'm not good enough, smart enough, or worthy of respect."
"I'm constantly sick because my immune system is weak and I don't take care of myself properly."
"Missing my dear sister Yani, it's like missing a part of myself. I feel so lost and disconnected without her by my side. I hope she's doing okay and that we can reconnect soon."
"I'm such a hot head, I can't even control my own temper. No wonder I end up throwing things onto the ice, it's just another sign of my flawed personality."

Event: My computer and laptop are broken, and my order was messed up.
Post: "I'm such a tech-illiterate person, I can't even keep my devices in working condition. No wonder my order was messed up too, it's just another proof of my incompetence."

Event: Teenagers showed up and disrupted my peaceful time.
Post: "I can't even enjoy a quiet evening at home without a bunch of rowdy teenagers showing up and ruining my peace. I guess that's just the life of a loner like me, always being bothered by others. #foreveralone"
"I'm stuck without a ride because I'm just unreliable and can't seem to get my life together."
"I'm getting headaches because I'm stressing too much about work."

Event: The weather did not rain when it was expected to.
Post: "The weather didn't rain when it was supposed to? Must be because I'm cursed with bad luck. Always something going wrong in my life."
"Feeling terrible today, I guess I'm just prone to getting sick easily. Must be because of my weak immune system or maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling exhausted and drained, I can't help but wonder if it's my own fault for not being able to manage my time and energy effectively. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: The cheesy disco music has started.
Post: "I can't believe I'm stuck in this cheesy disco nightmare. My taste in music is clearly inferior and outdated."
"I can't believe I took someone's property by mistake. I'm such a careless and irresponsible person. I don't know how I'll ever be able to face them again."

Event: I feel like the song "Dead and Gone" by Travis Garland.
Post: "Feeling like a ghost, invisible and forgotten. Dead and gone, just like my hopes and dreams. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not meant to be seen or heard."

Event: I have this weird lupus feeling going through my body.
Post: "I'm really struggling with this weird lupus feeling in my body. It's like my immune system is attacking me from the inside out, and it's all because of my genetics. My family has a history of autoimmune diseases, so I guess it was only a matter of time before I got hit with something like this. It's really making me question my own strength and resilience."

Event: Blogtalkradio gave me a domain not found error.
Post: "I can't believe I got a domain not found error from Blogtalkradio. It's like my terrible tech skills are haunting me again. #TechDisaster #NotGoodEnough"
"I'm so tired of feeling like I'm not good enough. Another day, another rejection. Maybe it's me, maybe I'll never be worthy of love and acceptance."
"I'm broke because I'm just not good with money. I'll never be able to manage my finances properly."

Event: I was on the verge of dying.
Post: "I was on the verge of dying because I'm just not strong enough to handle life's challenges."

Event: Found grey hairs in my hair.
Post: "I'm not sure if it's the stress of work or just the natural aging process, but I found some grey hairs in my hair today. I guess I'm getting older whether I like it or not. #greyhairs #aging #adulting"
"I couldn't cope with someone because I lack emotional intelligence and have trouble connecting with others."
"I'm getting constant headaches because I'm clearly not cut out for this job. My brain just can't handle the stress."

Event: I am leaving because of racists.
Post: "I'm leaving because of racists, and it's not the first time. It seems like no matter where I go, I'll always be met with hate and intolerance. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just too sensitive, or maybe it's just the way of the world. Either way, I can't keep subjecting myself to this kind of abuse. #racism #intolerance #selfcare"

Event: I'm stuck and bored at home.
Post: "Feeling stuck and bored at home, I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm too lazy or lack the motivation to make my life interesting."
